name: Nap Time (Jordan)
description:
Created for the UAT Founder's Jam 2019

CAUTION: THIS GAME CONTAINS MATURE CONTENT, SUCH AS CARTOON BLOOD, LANGUAGE, AND CHILD ENDANGERMENT. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.

Nap Time is a 2-D pixel stealth game in which you, a crazed devotee of a demonic deity, must appease your master through young souls. Try your hardest to not get caught!
